mapper.select: SELECT a.prd_num, a.prd_name, a.prd_price, b.img_prd FROM product a, (select prd_num , min(case when instr(i_file, '_2.') >0 then i_file end) as img_prd from product_image where (prd_num like '%air%') or (prd_num like '%fol%') or (prd_num like '%pot%') group by prd_num order by prd_num) b WHERE a.prd_num =b.prd_num(+) and ((a.prd_num like '%air%') or (a.prd_num like '%fol%') or (a.prd_num like '%pot%'))
